# AsyncContextDynamicConfigReturn

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/decorator/AsyncContextDynamicConfigReturn" symbolName="AsyncContextDynamicConfigReturn" /> AsyncContextDynamicConfigReturn

Protocol for a context prompt template function that returns a dynamic configuration.
